SOP_Rule: MRP must be printed on outer packaging
Expected_Finding: MRP printed clearly on box
Actual_Finding: MRP missing from outer box, only on inner tray
Action_Taken: Seller notified to reprint packaging with MRP on outer box

SOP_Rule: Manufacturer address must match registration
Expected_Finding: Registered address: Khasra 401, MG Road, Gurugram
Actual_Finding: Packaging shows: Plot 22, Sector 5, Noida
Action_Taken: Escalated to Process Expert — seller asked to provide updated registration

SOP_Rule: BIS certification number must be present on label
Expected_Finding: BIS R-XXXXX number printed below barcode
Actual_Finding: BIS certification number absent from label
Action_Taken: Seller submitted revised label with BIS number — recheck approved

SOP_Rule: MRP must be printed on outer packaging
Expected_Finding: MRP printed on outer packaging
Actual_Finding: MRP sticker placed over original price — original not visible
Action_Taken: Rejected — stickering over original price not permitted under BIS SOP

SOP_Rule: Manufacturer address must match registration
Expected_Finding: Registered address: Syska Group, Andheri East, Mumbai
Actual_Finding: Packaging shows warehouse address instead of registered office
Action_Taken: Seller corrected packaging to show registered office address

SOP_Rule: BIS certification number must be present on label
Expected_Finding: BIS R-XXXXX clearly printed
Actual_Finding: BIS number present but printed below minimum readable font size
Action_Taken: Awaiting updated artwork from seller for font size correction

SOP_Rule: MRP must be printed on outer packaging
Expected_Finding: MRP printed in INR on front panel
Actual_Finding: MRP printed but without INR symbol — only numeric value shown
Action_Taken: Seller updated label to include INR symbol alongside MRP

SOP_Rule: FCC ID must be visible on product
Expected_Finding: FCC ID printed on device back
Actual_Finding: FCC ID accessible only via Settings menu — not physically printed
Action_Taken: Escalated — FCC requires physical ID on device, software display not sufficient

SOP_Rule: Country of origin label required in English
Expected_Finding: Made in China printed on device and packaging
Actual_Finding: Country of origin on box only — device itself has no COO marking
Action_Taken: Awaiting confirmation from Apple India team on device-level COO placement

SOP_Rule: Country of origin label required in English
Expected_Finding: Made in South Korea — on back panel
Actual_Finding: Label present but in Korean script — English version absent
Action_Taken: Samsung India added English COO label to back panel — re-inspection passed

SOP_Rule: FCC ID must be visible on product
Expected_Finding: FCC ID on bottom label of laptop
Actual_Finding: FCC ID label present but partially obscured by warranty void sticker
Action_Taken: Seller repositioned warranty sticker — FCC ID now fully visible

SOP_Rule: Best before date must be in DD/MM/YYYY format
Expected_Finding: Best before: 15/03/2026
Actual_Finding: Best before printed as: MAR 2026 — month name used instead of number
Action_Taken: Seller updated packaging to use DD/MM/YYYY format as per FSSAI SOP

SOP_Rule: Allergen declaration must be highlighted in bold
Expected_Finding: Contains milk: printed in bold on back label
Actual_Finding: Allergen text present but in regular font — not highlighted or bold
Action_Taken: Escalated to compliance team — FSSAI mandate requires bold allergen text

SOP_Rule: Nutritional information table must be present
Expected_Finding: Full nutritional table with calories, fat, protein, carbs per 100g
Actual_Finding: Nutritional table present but missing sodium and sugar content
Action_Taken: Rejected — incomplete nutritional table does not meet FSSAI standard

SOP_Rule: FSSAI license number must appear on front label
Expected_Finding: FSSAI Lic. No. 10012021XXXXX on front label
Actual_Finding: FSSAI number present on back label only — not visible on front
Action_Taken: Seller repositioned FSSAI number to front label as per SOP requirement

SOP_Rule: Allergen declaration must be highlighted in bold
Expected_Finding: Allergen info in bold on front label
Actual_Finding: No allergen declaration found on label
Action_Taken: Rejected — allergen declaration completely absent, seller must reprint labels

Product_Name: MTR Ready to Eat Masala Dosa
SOP_Rule: Best before date must be in DD/MM/YYYY format
Expected_Finding: Best before: 10/08/2026
Actual_Finding: Expiry date printed as: 08-2026 — day omitted
Action_Taken: Rejected — day must be included in date format per FSSAI SOP009

SOP_Rule: Net quantity must be in metric units
Expected_Finding: 500ml printed prominently on front
Actual_Finding: Can shows 16.9 fl oz — metric equivalent 500ml in much smaller font
Action_Taken: Importer updated label to show 500ml in same prominence as fl oz value

SOP_Rule: Best before date must be in DD/MM/YYYY format
Expected_Finding: Best before: 22/09/2026
Actual_Finding: Date printed as: 22 Sep 26 — abbreviated month and year format
Action_Taken: Importer corrected date format to DD/MM/YYYY on India-specific packaging

SOP_Rule: Ingredient list must be in descending order by weight
Expected_Finding: Tomatoes, Distilled Vinegar, Corn Syrup, Salt...
Actual_Finding: Corn syrup listed before vinegar despite lower weight
Action_Taken: Escalated to Process Expert — requires lab verification of ingredient weights

SOP_Rule: Allergen declaration must be highlighted in bold
Expected_Finding: Contains: Milk, Eggs, Wheat, Soy in bold
Actual_Finding: Allergen text in bold but tree nuts not listed despite containing almonds
Action_Taken: Rejected — undeclared tree nut allergen is a critical food safety violation

SOP_Rule: Batch number and manufacturing date must be present
Expected_Finding: Batch no. and Mfg date printed on base of product
Actual_Finding: Manufacturing date present but batch number missing from all surfaces
Action_Taken: Seller added batch number to base label — re-inspection passed

SOP_Rule: Shelf life after opening must be indicated
Expected_Finding: PAO symbol with 12M printed on label
Actual_Finding: No Period After Opening (PAO) symbol found on product or packaging
Action_Taken: Seller added PAO 12M symbol to label — approved after re-check

SOP_Rule: List of ingredients must use INCI names
Expected_Finding: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine...
Actual_Finding: Ingredients listed using common names — e.g. Water instead of Aqua
Action_Taken: Seller updating ingredient list to INCI standard — review pending

SOP_Rule: Batch number and manufacturing date must be present
Expected_Finding: Batch and Mfg date on carton and tube
Actual_Finding: Batch number on carton but absent from tube itself
Action_Taken: Rejected — batch number must appear on product unit not just outer carton

SOP_Rule: Shelf life after opening must be indicated
Expected_Finding: PAO 24M symbol on label
Actual_Finding: Shelf life stated as 2 years but no PAO symbol — text only
Action_Taken: Seller replaced text with standard PAO symbol as required by CDSCO

SOP_Rule: Warning statements must be in English
Expected_Finding: Keep out of reach of children — in English on label
Actual_Finding: Warning present in English and French — French text larger than English
Action_Taken: Importer updated label — English warnings now in equal or larger font

SOP_Rule: List of ingredients must use INCI names
Expected_Finding: Aqua, Glycerin, Paraffinum Liquidum...
Actual_Finding: German INCI names used — Wasser instead of Aqua on India import batch
Action_Taken: Rejected — India import batch must use English INCI names on label

SOP_Rule: Shelf life after opening must be indicated
Expected_Finding: PAO 12M symbol on label
Actual_Finding: PAO symbol present but faded and illegible on received batch
Action_Taken: Importer replaced batch with corrected print run — PAO symbol clearly visible

SOP_Rule: Warning statements must be in English
Expected_Finding: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes.
Actual_Finding: Warning section blank on India-specific SKU — text missing entirely
Action_Taken: Rejected — warning statements are mandatory per FDA and CDSCO guidelines

SOP_Rule: Warning statements must be in English
Expected_Finding: For external use only. Keep away from eyes.
Actual_Finding: Warning text present but font size 4pt — not legible to naked eye
Action_Taken: Importer updated to minimum 6pt font for warning text — approved

SOP_Rule: Safety warning for choking hazard must be present
Expected_Finding: Warning: Choking hazard — small parts. Not for children under 3.
Actual_Finding: Choking hazard warning absent from packaging
Action_Taken: Critical safety deviation — product rejected, seller must add mandatory warning

SOP_Rule: Age recommendation must be printed on packaging
Expected_Finding: Suitable for ages 3+ printed on front
Actual_Finding: Age recommendation sticker peeling off — not permanently printed
Action_Taken: Seller switched to heat-printed age label — approved

SOP_Rule: Safety warning for choking hazard must be present
Expected_Finding: Choking hazard warning in English and Hindi on front panel
Actual_Finding: Warning present in English only — Hindi translation missing
Action_Taken: Seller added Hindi warning text — meets bilingual SOP requirement

SOP_Rule: EN 71 safety standard reference must be on label
Expected_Finding: EN 71-1, EN 71-2, EN 71-3 compliance stated on box
Actual_Finding: CE mark present but EN 71 standard reference absent from packaging
Action_Taken: LEGO India added EN 71 compliance statement to India import packaging

SOP_Rule: ASTM F963 compliance statement required
Expected_Finding: Meets ASTM F963 toy safety standard
Actual_Finding: ASTM F963 statement absent — only CPSC tracking label present
Action_Taken: Rejected — ASTM F963 statement is mandatory for all toys per CPSC SOP

SOP_Rule: Safety warning for choking hazard must be present
Expected_Finding: Choking hazard warning on front panel
Actual_Finding: Warning label present on inner packaging only — not visible at point of sale
Action_Taken: Escalated — safety warning must be visible at POS per CPSC requirement

SOP_Rule: ASTM F963 compliance statement required
Expected_Finding: Meets ASTM F963 toy safety standard
Actual_Finding: ASTM statement in US version — missing from India import SKU
Action_Taken: Importer added ASTM statement to India SKU packaging — approved

SOP_Rule: EN 71 safety standard reference must be on label
Expected_Finding: EN 71 reference printed on base of packaging
Actual_Finding: EN 71 reference present on EU packaging but absent from India import batch
Action_Taken: Distributor updated India batch packaging to include EN 71 reference

SOP_Rule: ISI mark must be embossed or printed on product
Expected_Finding: ISI mark embossed on lid and body
Actual_Finding: ISI mark present on packaging only — not on product unit itself
Action_Taken: Escalated — ISI must be on product per BIS mandate, not just packaging

SOP_Rule: Wattage and voltage rating must be visible
Expected_Finding: Not applicable — non-electric product, field marked N/A
Actual_Finding: Voltage rating field left blank — should be marked N/A for non-electrical items
Action_Taken: Seller updated product form to mark N/A for electrical fields

SOP_Rule: Wattage and voltage rating must be visible
Expected_Finding: 1500W, 220-240V printed on base plate
Actual_Finding: Wattage printed but voltage range missing — only shows 220V not 220-240V
Action_Taken: Seller corrected base plate marking to show full voltage range 220-240V

SOP_Rule: ISI mark must be embossed or printed on product
Expected_Finding: ISI mark on body with valid BIS certification number
Actual_Finding: ISI mark present but certification number beside it is expired — old BIS number
Action_Taken: Rejected — expired BIS number found, seller must renew and resubmit

SOP_Rule: Declaration of Conformity document must be included
Expected_Finding: DoC document in English included in box
Actual_Finding: No Declaration of Conformity document found in shipment
Action_Taken: Rejected — DoC is mandatory for CE-Mark products entering Indian market

SOP_Rule: Food-safe material certification must be attached
Expected_Finding: FDA food-contact material certificate attached
Actual_Finding: Food-safe certificate referenced in docs but physical copy not attached
Action_Taken: Seller emailed physical certificate — attached to product file, approved

SOP_Rule: Declaration of Conformity document must be included
Expected_Finding: DoC document in English, current version
Actual_Finding: DoC document present but dated 2021 — product model updated in 2023
Action_Taken: Escalated — DoC must match current product version, Dyson India contacted

SOP_Rule: Wattage and voltage rating must be visible
Expected_Finding: 2400W, 220-240V on base plate
Actual_Finding: Wattage label on base plate damaged and unreadable on received batch
Action_Taken: Rejected — damaged wattage label fails BIS visibility requirement, new batch requested

SOP_Rule: FCC ID must be visible on product
Expected_Finding: FCC ID printed on underside of device
Actual_Finding: FCC ID label present but covered by foam padding inside packaging on all units
Action_Taken: Importer removed foam layer covering FCC label — re-inspection cleared

SOP_Rule: ISI mark must be embossed or printed on product
Expected_Finding: ISI mark on motor body
Actual_Finding: ISI mark on body but no certification number alongside it
Action_Taken: Seller asked to confirm BIS certification number for the ISI mark on file

SOP_Rule: Nutritional information table must be present
Expected_Finding: Full nutritional table per 100g serving
Actual_Finding: Nutritional table present but values given per 5g serving only — FSSAI requires per 100g
Action_Taken: Seller informed to reprint nutritional table with per 100g values as required
